page.title: 06The Quarry Hay in Chew Stoke
page.content: {"Quarry Hay"}is in Chew Stoke opposite Brian's Garage. In the early morning the milkman comes clattering his bottles. About seven in the morning my next door neighbour's children get up and start shouting and yelling. They are only young, so I don't blame them. I get up about half eight and I always go on my bike first, I go for a ride around the village and come back to little children running around on "Quarry Hay". I hardly go out in the morning because I do my homework. At about ten o'clock I go out on{"the {Hay"}as we used to call it. I muck around with my tennis ball and when I am tired I go in for lunch. The Hay goes all quiet at lunch time. In the Afternoon I go out on my bike with my mate Kev. I don't know what goes on in Quarry Hay at night because I don't go out.
